parameters.name: subscriptionPicker
parameters.label: Subscription
parameters.query:
resourcecontainers
| where type == "microsoft.resources/subscriptions"
| project subscriptionId, name
| order by name asc

parameters.name: resourceGroupPicker
parameters.label: Resource Group
parameters.query:
resourcecontainers
| where type == "microsoft.resources/subscriptions/resourcegroups"
| where subscriptionId in~ ({subscriptionPicker})
| project resourceGroup, label = name
| order by label asc

parameters.name: resource
parameters.label: Databricks workspace
parameters.query:
resources
| where type == "microsoft.databricks/workspaces"
| where resourceGroup in ({resourceGroupPicker})
| extend [parameter(tagPrefix)]Managed = iff((tostring(tags) has '"[parameter(tagPrefix)]Managed":"true"'), "yes", "no")
| where [parameter(tagPrefix)]Managed in~ ({[parameter(tagPrefix)]Managed})
| project id, name

parameters.name: workspacesId
parameters.label: Workspace ID
parameters.query:
resources 
| where type == "microsoft.databricks/workspaces"
| where id in~ ({resource})
| where subscriptionId in~ ({subscriptionPicker})
| where resourceGroup in~ ({resourceGroupPicker})
| extend ['Workspace Id'] = tostring(properties.workspaceId)
| project ['Workspace Id']

content.query:
resources
    | where type == "microsoft.databricks/workspaces"
	| where id in~ ({resource})
	| where subscriptionId in~ ({subscriptionPicker})
	| where resourceGroup in~ ({resourceGroupPicker})
    | extend ['Resource type'] = "Workspace"
    | extend ['SKU'] = tostring(sku.name) 
    | extend Subscription = strcat('/subscriptions/', subscriptionId)
    | extend rgName = split(id, "/", 4)[0]
    | extend ['Resource group'] = strcat('/subscriptions/', subscriptionId, '/resourceGroups/', rgName)   
    | extend [parameter(tagPrefix)]Managed = iff((tostring(tags) has '"[parameter(tagPrefix)]Managed":"true"'), "yes", "no")
    | where [parameter(tagPrefix)]Managed in~ ({[parameter(tagPrefix)]Managed})   
    | project ['Resource'] = id, ['Name'] = name, ['Resource type'], ['Provisioning state'] = tostring(properties.provisioningState), ['SKU'], ['Location'] = location, [parameter(tagPrefix)]Managed, Subscription, ['Resource group'], ['Workspace Id'] = tostring(properties.workspaceId)
| order by Subscription, ['Workspace Id'], ['Resource type'] desc
content.title: Azure Databricks environments
content.noDataMessage: No resources deployed for chosen environment

content.query:
resources
    | where type == "microsoft.compute/virtualmachines" and tostring(tags) has "Databricks"
	| where subscriptionId in~ ({subscriptionPicker})
    | extend ['Resource type'] = "Cluster"    
    | extend ['Cluster name'] = tostring(tags.ClusterName)
    | extend ['SKU'] = tostring(properties.storageProfile.imageReference.sku)  
    | extend ['Resource class'] = tostring(tags.ResourceClass)
    | extend ['VM Size'] = tostring(properties.hardwareProfile.vmSize)
    | extend ['Location'] = location
    | extend Subscription = strcat('/subscriptions/', subscriptionId)
    | extend rgName = split(id, "/", 4)[0]
    | extend ['Resource group'] = strcat('/subscriptions/', subscriptionId, '/resourceGroups/', rgName) 
    | extend ['Workspace Id'] = substring(tags.DatabricksEnvironment, strlen("workerenv-"), strlen(tags.DatabricksEnvironment) - strlen("workerenv-")+1)  
    | where ['Workspace Id'] in ({workspacesId})
    | extend ['Provisioning state'] = tostring(properties.provisioningState)
| project ['Resource'] = id, ['Name'] = name, ['Resource type'], ['Cluster name'], ['Provisioning state'], ['SKU'],  ['Resource class'], ['VM Size'], ['Location'], Subscription, ['Resource group'], ['Workspace Id']
| order by Subscription, ['Workspace Id'], ['Cluster name'] desc
content.title: Azure Databricks clusters and VMs
content.noDataMessage: No running cluster or cluster was not created

content.json: #### No Azure Databricks workspace deployed in this environment yet
